tr_s89DescFooter:
Märku s õpilasele. Ülesande allikmaterjali ja õppetüki numbri leiad „Kristliku elu ja teenistuse” koosoleku töövihikust. Palun vaata üle selle osa kohta käivad juhised „Kristliku elu ja teenistuse koosoleku juhendist”
(S-38).
tr_cbsLffWithPointsVariations: lff tund {{ lesson }} punktid {{ points }}|lff tund {{ lesson }} punkt {{ points }}
tr_noWMeetingWeek: There is no weekend meeting for this week
tr_noMeetingWeek: There is no meeting for this week
tr_exportMidweekMeetinDesc: Choose the schedules and forms you'd like to export and pick your preferred template. Organized saves your template choice for next time to make the export easier.
tr_applicationAPSDesc: Because of my love for Jehovah and my desire to help others to learn about him and his loving purposes, I would like to increase my share in the field service by enrolling as an auxiliary pioneer for the period indicated below:
tr_continuousAPS: I desire to serve continuously as an auxiliary pioneer until further notice.
tr_pioneerApplicationMoral: I am of good moral standing and habits. I have made plans that will enable me to meet the hour requirement.—See the June 2013 Our Kingdom Ministry, p. 2.
tr_noteAPSApplication: NOTE: If possible, please submit this application at least a week before you desire to begin your auxilary pioneer service. This application is not to be sent to the branch office but, rather, will be kept by the congregation for its files.
tr_attentionServiceCommittee:
Attention Congregation Service committee:

1. Is the applicant a good example in Christian living, being of good moral character?

2. Persons reproved or reinstated during the past year or those who still have restrictions on them do not qualify.

3. Have you consulted with the appropriate group overseer?
tr_moreInformationForAP: Kas oled huvitatud üldpioneeriks saamisest? Esita avaldus aadressil hub.jw.org või võta ühendust oma kogudusevanematega.
tr_hourGoalDesc: Alalise abipioneeri tunninorm on 30 tundi. Kuid kogudusevanemate poolt teatatud kuude jooksul võid kuulutada ka 15 tundi.
tr_applicationSubmittedDesc: Sinu koguduse teenistuskomitee vaatab selle üle ja kui see on heaks kiidetud, teavitavad vanemad sind
tr_continuousAP: Soovin teenida alalise abipioneerina kuni edasise teavituseni.
tr_monthsPendingAP: Oled juba esitanud abipioneeriteenistuse avalduse järgmisteks kuudeks: {{ months }}. Sa võid taotleda tulevasi kuid igal ajal.
tr_monthsApprovedAP: Sa oled heaks kiidetud teenima abipioneerina järgmistel kuudel: {{ months }}. Sa võid taotleda tulevasi kuid igal ajal.
